name: Donair Egg Rolls
description: Thank you, Brittany Hickey, for this recipe!
preparation: Brown ground beef in frying pan with water and seasoning. Separate well.
Scoop cooked meat onto the egg roll wrapper. Fold down top corner, followed by left corner, then right corner. Roll the rest down into the bottom corner and seal with a fingertip dipped in water.
Brush each egg roll with an egg wash.
Spray inside of air fryer basket with cooking spray. Lay egg rolls in basket without them touching or overlapping.
Cook at 400° F for 8 minutes, turning halfway through.
Whisk together until well blended. Refrigerate for one hour prior to serving.

products.name: Donair Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Any way you name it – gyro, shawarma, donair, or doner kebab – our Donair Seasoning is what you’re looking for. You won’t believe how easy it is to make the street food staple at home in minutes with this blend and a few simple ingredients. Just add the seasoning to ground beef, press it into a Rectangular Steamer and cook it in the microwave for 10 minutes or the oven for 60. Slice thinly and serve on a pita with fresh veggies and tzatziki – dinner is done!

products.name: Roasted Garlic Aioli Mix
summary: A creamy roasted garlic condiment for your burger, sandwich or use as a dip for fries or veg.
